remarks: Define the well-founded relation predicate.  Definition 6.24(1) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 30.  For alternate definitions, see ~ dffr2 and ~ dffr3 .  (Contributed by NM, 3-Apr-1994.)
statement:
df-fr $p |- ( R Fr A <-> A. x ( ( x C_ A /\ x =/= (/) ) -> E. y e. x A. z e. x -. z R y ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d R x y z $.
